column14: This is a gorgeous hand soap that exceeds expectations. Not only does it smell so delicious you will want to eat it, it's actually moisturizing rather than drying like so many other hand soaps out there. The fact that it is all organic also aligns with my values of putting pure products on my skin. Try it, you won't regret it.
